chatbot.title: Registration Assistant
chatbot.greeting: Hi! I'm here to help you get started with Smart AI Referrals. Would you like to earn money by promoting local businesses, or are you a business owner looking to get more customers?
chatbot.chooseType: Are you here to earn money as a promoter, or do you want to get new customers for your business?
chatbot.askName: Perfect! Let's start with your name. What should I call you?
chatbot.askEmail: Nice to meet you! What's your email address?
chatbot.askPassword: Great! Now create a secure password (at least 6 characters).
chatbot.askBusinessName: Now let's set up your business. What's your business name?
chatbot.askCategory: What category best describes your business?
chatbot.askAddress: What's the address where customers can find you?
chatbot.askPhone: What phone number should customers use to reach you?
chatbot.askDescription: Briefly describe your business (optional - you can skip this).
chatbot.askWebsite: Do you have a website? (optional - you can skip this)
chatbot.confirmData: Here's a summary of your information. Does everything look correct?
chatbot.authMethod: How would you like to sign up?
chatbot.complete: All done! Your account is ready. Redirecting you to your dashboard...
chatbot.error: Something went wrong. Please try again.
